markdownRemark.html: Recently I’ve spent some time on CUDA programming and implementing custom Ops for TensorFlow. As an exercise, I decided to take a shot at implementing a custom Op for one of the operations in capsule networks that would normally require some reshape hacking or at least a couple of intermediate TensorFlow Ops. If you’re not familiar with Capsule Networks, have a look at the article or my previous post. The open-sourced capsule network code by the original authors can be found here. The code that we discuss in this blog post can be found here.
